item.title: Jonathan Glazer’s ‘THE ZONE OF INTEREST’ holds a score of 99 on Metacritic after premiering at the 76th Cannes Film Festival.

item.title:
Todd Haynes’ ‘MAY DECEMBER’ debuts with a 92% score on Rotten Tomatoes.
Starring Natalie Portman, Julianne Moore and Charles Melton.
